body:
I can't find older threads with this topic so I'm starting a new one. 

Rules:
List things you hate
Don't list people in the community
This is a hateful thread obviously but please don't flame/argue

Here are some things I hate
  • Most modern music 
  • Rabid PewDiePie subscribers
  • People Who Capitalize Every Word In A Sentence
  • Youtube comments 
  • Justin Beiber
  • People who talk shit on the internet 
  • People who try to sound smart but just end up looking dumb

replies.body:
Most of the things I hate have to deal with people.
  1. People who make assumptions about me without getting to know me first
  2. People who smack their food
  3. Loud people
  4. People who talk to me when I'm trying to do something else
  5. PeOpLe WhO tYpE lIkE dIsSsSs
  6. People who spit when they talk. I mean, I do it sometimes too, but like by the time your conversation is over, your arm or whatever is soaked
  7. People (except my friends)
  8. Spiders
I have a lot more, but I'd rather not get into those.

replies.body:
I don't like when players spam blocks everywhere, especially when they run in front of me and place blocks in my face. I honestly think people who do this have something missing in their brain. 

I don't like when players run in front of me while I'm mining iron or any other block, like wtf you have your own pick, try using it. Especially when they keep standing where I'm supposed to mine and act like they got dropped when they were born and someone accidently jumped on their head. 

I don't like when people talk behind my back like I wouldn't know and when they are coward enough to not even apologize to me. Yes, if you try apologizing, you might even earn my respect. 

I don't like when people expect you to do everything for them and not even once thank you for it. Ungrateful ******. 

I don't like when people think they can threaten me and get away with it. I'm not someone you should play that kinda jokes with. 

I don't like ************ and ****.

I don't like people.

I don't like when people think they can threaten me and get away with it. I'm not someone you should play that kinda jokes with. 

I don't like ************ and ****.

I don't like people.

Anyways, not listing any pet peeves as Stimulating said but things I hate are:
- Bias
- False logic (like when I get grounded for not doing shit)
- Ignorance
- Squeakers who squeak EVEN MORE on purpose (not naming any Games)
- False infractions (major false infractions, not 1 hour tempbans off TeamSpeak =_=)
- Fanboys (especially the ignorant ones but I do like the ones that troll for example: DualzzRiwiking_17)

replies.body:
1. When people eat or breath loudly and snoring, this annoys me above anything in the world I literally go crazy when I hear it (legit.)

2. American pingers who go around destroying everyone and are all cocky believing that "It's all skill."

3. When staff members don't use proper grammar (Not pointing a finger at Avicus)

4. When adults think they're superior to younger people.

5. People rush to conclusions after they hear things.

6. People who are impatient and rush (IRL), Jeez what's the hurry? I'll go quicker when I need to.

7. People who always say things like "Your mum!"

8. When I'm called an Australian, do you Americans like being called Canadians?

I'm such a hater >,<.
